name: elfvdmOLD
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
-| wi(wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
-| wi(wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wne(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cdm(c1)))
-| wi(wn(wcel(c2, cdm(c1))), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
